MULT_KEY_CODE: OID300_<IDCR_ID>
Clear MUL
O online, build diffeences list (if any) and show
differenes found, show and let user decide how to proceed

Ok/Select user confirmed differences so synchronize temp table
Cancel: exit OID300
Undefined action close everything
